scripts.pre-release: version=$(cat ../opentofu-dist/package.json | jq -r '.version') && opentofuVersion=$(echo $version | sed -e 's/-[0-9]*$//g' | sed -e 's/^v//g') && jq '.version = "'$version'"' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && curl -LO https://github.com/opentofu/opentofu/releases/download/v${opentofuVersion}/tofu_${opentofuVersion}_windows_amd64.zip && unzip -o -j tofu_*.zip tofu.exe && rm tofu_*.zip
